user_query: I need to update our vaccination protocols with the latest guidelines for childhood vaccinations based on age, weight, and medical history.

TaskList.description: Gather the latest vaccination guidelines for children from a medical authority or health organization.
Obtain references or recommendations for vaccination adjustments based on age, weight, and medical history.
Compile the collected guidelines and recommendations into a single document for review.
Distribute the updated vaccination protocols to the relevant staff members in the pediatric clinic.
